ch.usz.c3pro.c3_pro_android_framework.questionnaire.logic

Class TaskResult2QuestionnaireResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.usz.c3pro.c3_pro_android_framework.questionnaire.logic.TaskResult2QuestionnaireResponse

  • public class TaskResult2QuestionnaireResponse
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the tools to create a FHIR QuestionnaireResponse from a ResearchStack TaskResult

    • Method Detail

      • taskResult2QuestionnaireResponse

        public static org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.QuestionnaireResponse taskResult2QuestionnaireResponse(org.researchstack.backbone.result.TaskResult taskResult)
        Returns a FHIR QuestionnaireResponse based on the passed ResearchStack TaskResult
        Parameters:
        taskResult - The taskResult of the conducted survey produced by a ViewTaskActivity
        Returns:
        A FHIR QuestionnaireResponse that contains all the question IDs with corresponding answers given by the user

      • stepResult2ResponseItem

        public static org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.QuestionnaireResponse.QuestionnaireResponseItemComponent stepResult2ResponseItem(org.researchstack.backbone.result.StepResult stepResult)
        Returns a FHIR QuestionnaireResponse.QuestionnaireResponseItemComponent based on the passed ResearchStack StepResult
        Parameters:
        stepResult - An individual stepResult of a ResearchStack TaskResult
        Returns:
        A FHIR QuestionnaireResponse.QuestionnaireResponseItemComponent that contains the question ID with the corresponding answer given by the user

      • getFHIRAnswerForStepResult

        public static java.util.List<org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.QuestionnaireResponse.QuestionnaireResponseItemAnswerComponent> getFHIRAnswerForStepResult(org.researchstack.backbone.result.StepResult stepResult)
        Returns a QuestionnaireResponse.QuestionnaireResponseItemAnswerComponent based on the passed ResearchStack StepResult
        Parameters:
        stepResult - A StepResult containing an answer given by the user
        Returns:
        A QuestionnaireResponse.QuestionnaireResponseItemAnswerComponent containing the answer given by the user

      • getFHIRAnswersForChoiceStepResult

        public static java.util.List<org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.QuestionnaireResponse.QuestionnaireResponseItemAnswerComponent> getFHIRAnswersForChoiceStepResult(org.researchstack.backbone.result.StepResult stepResult)
        Returns a QuestionnaireResponse.QuestionnaireResponseItemAnswerComponent based on the passed ResearchStack StepResult
        Parameters:
        stepResult - A StepResult containing an answer given by the user
        Returns:
        A QuestionnaireResponse.QuestionnaireResponseItemAnswerComponent containing the answer given by the user

      • resultIntent2QuestionnaireResponse

        public static org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.QuestionnaireResponse resultIntent2QuestionnaireResponse(android.content.Intent data)
        Returns a QuestionnaireResponse based on the ResearchStack StepResult within the passed Intent. This is the Intent returned in the onActivityResult() method of the parent activity of the ViewTaskActivity
        Parameters:
        data - The Intent returned by the ViewTaskActivity
        Returns:
        A QuestionnaireResponse containing the answers given by the user
